SpriteServer.createUser

Interface

(params: ISpriteCreateArcadeUser)

Create a user. username, password, and access controls to multiple databases can be established using the databases property of the input parameters. The databases object uses â€˜groupsâ€™ to grant access controls. Assigning a user to groups within a specific database grants them the permissions associated with those groups for a particular database.

Example

const server = new SpriteServer({
  username: 'aUser',
  password: 'aPassword',
  address: 'http://localhost:2480',
});

async function createUserExample(details: ISpriteCreateArcadeUser) {
  try {
    const created = await server.createUser(details);
    console.log(created);
    // true
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(error);
    // handle error conditions
  }
}

createUserExample({
  username: 'myUsername',
  password: 'myPassword',
  databases: {
    "FirstDatabase": "admin"
    "SecondDatabase": "user"
  }
});
